T02D2967:46a-0: @46a * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2967:46a-1: pha rol gyi dmag gi dpung las rnam par rgyal
T02D2967:46a-2: bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan
T02D2967:46a-3: pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par bum pa la
T02D2967:46a-4: sogs pa'i rdzas rnams rdzogs par byas la /
T02D2967:46a-5: tshad med pa la sogs pa bsgom pa'i rim pa ma nor bar byas te /
T02D2967:46a-6: de nas bdag nyid tshogs rdzogs par byas la /
T02D2967:46a-7: stobs po che sku mdog nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa ral gri dang gtun shing dang /
T02D2967:46a-11: mda' 'dzin pa shin tu 'jigs pa yang 'jigs par
T02D2967:46a-12: byed pa h'um las rnam par bsgom par bya ste
T02D2967:46a-13: / de nyid snying ga'i h'um gi sa bon las
T02D2967:46a-14: 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros pas de nyid
T02D2967:46a-15: kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i ba spu'i bu ga
T02D2967:46a-16: tshun chod nas sprul pa'i khro chung tho ba dang
T02D2967:46a-17: zhags pa dang ral gri thogs pa dpag tu med
T02D2967:46a-18: / pa byung ste / pha rol gyi sde thams
T02D2967:46a-19: cad tshar bcad de rab tu pham par byas pa
T02D2967:46a-20: la dmigs te yungs kar dang zhi dkar sa dang
T02D2967:46a-21: / pa byung ste / / ske tshe dang til
T02D2967:46a-22: gyi gang bu la sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags
T02D2967:46a-23: nas dmag gi sde'i gdong du gtor na pha rol
T02D2967:46a-24: gyi g-yul nyes shing 'pham par 'gyur ro //
T02D2967:46a-26: aom pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pram bhanydza
T02D2967:46a-27: n'a ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes brjod
T02D2967:46a-28: cing rab tu sdang ba'i gzugs dang /
T02D2967:46a-29: lta stangs kyis rnam par bltas te /
T02D2967:46b-0: ma rungs pas bsams na bdag @46b nyid kyi g-yul rgyal bar nges so //
T02D2967:46b-1: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i
